stories.Title: Japan’s lunar quest failed
stories.Description: iSpace's Hakuto-R lander is believed to have crashed upon landing, a major setback for Japan, but plans for a second moonshot next year are in progress.
stories.Tweet: Japan’s lunar quest failed 📦 iSpace's Hakuto-R lander is believed to have crashed upon landing, a major setback for Japan, but plans for a second moonshot next year are in progress. #space https://apnews.com/article/moon-landing-spacecraft-japan-uae-555ec67e1150f8008b65243e3a6179d2

stories.Title: Get ready for the Falcon Heavy
stories.Description: Two satellites are set to be launched into orbit tomorrow, as SpaceX's Falcon Heavy rocket prepares for its sixth mission.
stories.Tweet: Get ready for the Falcon Heavy 📦 Two satellites are set to be launched into orbit tomorrow, as SpaceX's Falcon Heavy rocket prepares for its sixth mission. #spaceX https://www.space.com/spacex-falcon-heavy-sixth-mission-launch-viasat-3-americas

stories.Title: Abort mission: Falcon 9 launch gets delayed
stories.Description: Due to landing concerns, the launch of 49 Starlink satellites from Vandenberg Space Force Base in California was scrubbed just 16 seconds before liftoff.
stories.Tweet: Abort mission: Falcon 9 launch gets delayed 📦 Due to landing concerns, the launch of 49 Starlink satellites from Vandenberg Space Force Base in California was scrubbed just 16 seconds before liftoff. #spaceX https://www.space.com/spacex-aborts-starlink-3-5-satellites-launch

stories.Title: OpenAI's latest announcements
stories.Description: The company has introduced new controls that allow users to turn off chat history and opt out of model training. Additionally, a new subscription plan for businesses is in the works.
stories.Tweet: OpenAI's latest announcements 📦 The company has introduced new controls that allow users to turn off chat history and opt out of model training. Additionally, a new subscription plan for businesses is in the works. #chatgpt https://arstechnica.com/information-technology/2023/04/chatgpt-users-can-now-opt-out-of-chat-history-and-model-training/

stories.Title: Apple presents: A new health coach
stories.Description: Quartz, an AI-based health coach, will reportedly use Apple Watch data to create personalized programs for exercise, diet, and sleep.
stories.Tweet: Apple presents: A new health coach 📦 Quartz, an AI-based health coach, will reportedly use Apple Watch data to create personalized programs for exercise, diet, and sleep. #apple https://www.engadget.com/apple-is-reportedly-developing-an-ai-health-coach-for-apple-watch-212515646.html

stories.Title: The moon could be our future home
stories.Description: Scientists at NASA's Johnson Space Center in Houston achieve a key milestone toward establishing a long-term presence on the moon, by successfully extracting oxygen from simulated lunar soil.
stories.Tweet: The moon could be our future home 📦 Scientists at NASA's Johnson Space Center in Houston achieve a key milestone toward establishing a long-term presence on the moon, by successfully extracting oxygen from simulated lunar soil. #NASA https://www.nasa.gov/feature/nasa-successfully-extracts-oxygen-from-lunar-soil-simulant

stories.Title: Read news in a fun way
stories.Description: Artifact, the news app created by Instagram founders, is introducing a new AI feature that can summarize articles in a variety of styles.
stories.Tweet: Read news in a fun way 📦 Artifact, the news app created by Instagram founders, is introducing a new AI feature that can summarize articles in a variety of styles. #ai https://techcrunch.com/2023/04/25/news-app-artifact-can-now-summarize-stories-using-ai-including-in-fun-styles/

stories.Title: Spotify CEO discusses AI's impact on creativity
stories.Description: The complexity of the issue surrounding deep fakes in music represents new challenges for the creative industry, which is aiming to protect artists from the fast-paced development of AI.
stories.Tweet: Spotify CEO discusses AI's impact on creativity 📦 The complexity of the issue surrounding deep fakes in music represents new challenges for the creative industry, which is aiming to protect artists from the fast-paced development of AI. #spotify https://techcrunch.com/2023/04/25/spotify-ceo-says-ai-progress-is-both-really-cool-and-scary-may-pose-risk-to-creative-industry/

stories.Title: A guide to prompting AI
stories.Description: Want to improve your prompting skills? Look no further, this guide will help you to experiment with different prompts and successfully engage in dialogue with your AI of choice.
stories.Tweet: A guide to prompting AI 📦 Want to improve your prompting skills? Look no further, this guide will help you to experiment with different prompts and successfully engage in dialogue with your AI of choice. #ai https://www.oneusefulthing.org/p/a-guide-to-prompting-ai-for-what

stories.Title: A wild Cybertruck appeared!
stories.Description: The new design for Tesla's revolutionary electric pickup has sparked discussion amongst fans following a recent sighting.
stories.Tweet: A wild Cybertruck appeared! 📦 The new design for Tesla's revolutionary electric pickup has sparked discussion amongst fans following a recent sighting. #tesla https://electrek.co/2023/04/26/tesla-cybertruck-sighting-doubt-about-design-poll/

stories.Title: Hugging Face releases their own chatbot
stories.Description: Designed to feel like a human, HuggingChat is the newest challenger to ChatGPT's throne. This open source AI assistant easily understands and responds to natural language queries.
stories.Tweet: Hugging Face releases their own chatbot 📦 Designed to feel like a human, HuggingChat is the newest challenger to ChatGPT's throne. This open source AI assistant easily understands and responds to natural language queries. #ai https://www.producthunt.com/posts/hugging-chat
